item.title: arXiv 2022 BO
item.description: Shuhei A. Horiguchi, Tomoharu Iwata, Taku Tsuzuki, Yosuke Ozawa. Linear Embedding-based High-dimensional Batch Bayesian Optimization without Reconstruction Mappings. preprint. arXiv:2211.00947 https://arxiv.org/abs/2211.00947

item.title: Theory of The Immune System
item.description: I built a mathematical model of the adaptive immune system by applying and extending the theories of machine learning. This project was a part of my master’s thesis under the supervision of Tetsuya J. Kobayashi at the University of Tokyo. I received the Poster Award in Annual Meeting of JSMB2020. The paper is still under preparation. Kato and Kobayashi proposed a model of the adaptive immune system based on the reinforcement learning theory (Phys.
